long_description: Protect your big rig with the Lizard Skins Jumbo 29er neoprene chainstay protector, which helps prevent unsightly nicks, dings and scratches while also reducing chain slap noise. Constructed out of 2mm neoprene to deter nicks and scratches from marring your frame; also helps reduce the noise of chain slap. The Lizard Skins Jumbo 29er chainstay protector uses heavy-duty thread in its stitching to add extra strength and durability.
short_description: Protect your big rig with the Lizard Skins Jumbo 29er neoprene chainstay protector, which helps prevent unsightly nicks, dings and scratches while also reducing chain slap noise.
